name: Morning After
description:
Yesterday you partied like it’s 1999. 

Today you have work at 08:00. 
You wake up at 07:55 with the worst hangover of your life. Can you make it out of your apartment in time?

Move with WASD
Use items with F
Drag doors open with LEFT MOUSE.

Made as part of Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam event. 
Using the Haunted PSX render pipeline for Unity.
